title: Hybrid E-Mentoring Course for Strengthening Medical Leadership Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Over 3 Years of Experience in Medical or Administrative Roles
context.additional_context: Flexible learning environments compatible with workplace tasks, incorporating real-time communication via smartphones and asynchronous learning activities.

learning_goals: Acquire at least three decision-making skills for effective team leadership in medical environments
Implement mentoring feedback via digital platforms with over 80% completion
Develop a leadership behavior change plan, execute it within 7 days, and submit results

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
